name: Cube Pew Pew
description:
CubePewPew, a bad bootleg of a good game. Featuring hats, giant guns, velociraptors and lots and lots of buff Cubes with butt physics.

Nothing marks a high-quality game like the release of an unofficial knock-off. So we’ve taken everything good about the 2D multiplayer mayhem that is SQUARE HEROES, and made it 3D, and also much worse!!

This was created for fun as part of Perth’s Potluck games event. For more details on the real, and much better quality, original game, check out the Square Heroes website: http://www.squareheroes.com

Programming: Amos Wolfe

Art: Jess Watson

Voice Over: Drew Paridaens
